Hello, I'm Yogendra Kumar Mishra.

I'm currently pursuing BS in Data Science and Applications at IIT Madras.

I have a strong interest in Computer Science and Data Science. I try to stay up to date with the latest developments in the field. I like building things that solve problems of my own and make my life easier.

When I'm not on my computer, I like casually hating on gui users, muscle posing in every mirror I stumble upon, reading books and mangas, watching animes/cartoons, surfing wikipedia and reddit.
